Container.Name: Floatplane-Downloader
Container.Overview:
Floatplane-Downloader - Automagically downloads the latest videos from Floatplane and optionally formats them to be viewed in Plex. Both downloading videos as they release and archiving the entire backlog is supported.
To setup floatplane-downloader, you will first need to authenticate your account via the OAuth link sent in the container logs on startup. Then edit the settings.json file in /mnt/user/appdata/floatplane-downloader/db and restart. Settings guide: https://github.com/Inrixia/Floatplane-Downloader/blob/master/wiki/settings.md
Alternatively to the settings.json you can utilize the advanced-env setup to configure it only through container variables: https://github.com/Inrixia/Floatplane-Downloader/blob/master/wiki/advenv.md
